Which/who前面有comma係non-defining clause
無comma就係defining clause
例如
1) 100 people, who are 林鄭's fans, attend the meeting 就係講緊100個人attend個meeting, 而嗰100個人都係林鄭嘅fans
2) 100 people who are 林鄭' s fans attend the meeting 就係講緊100個林鄭嘅fans attend個meeting, 但個meeting上面total有幾多人就唔知啦

replies.msg:
呢句野兩個tense都得，但要睇用法

Has been: present perfect
He has been killed. (we don’t know when)
時間點唔肯定
新聞/formal比較常用

Was: past tense
He was killed at about 11pm. (specific time)
He was killed in 1885. (long ago)
有特定時間，或者係遠古歷史就會用

oral is a practical skill. You can speak better only by speaking more.

try this:
choose a topic, e.g. introduce yrself,
say, introduce yeself in 3 mins.
PLAN: 1 min for introduction, 1 min for yr favouite subject, 1 min to describe smthg in particular

Speak to yrself, or record yr own presentation

see if it works...

poetry唔一定淨係讀英國詩人，有好多選擇，易入手嘅我鍾意robert frost，edgar allen poe

Dear Boss,

I have read the internal circular that related to hire a new branch manager in my office. I would like to apply this vacancy as an internal candidate. The reason of why I am interested to the new post is that I am the right person to solve the main problems in the branch office. In addition, it is beneficial to my career development for working as a managerial role.
As a short review of my background, I have worked in this organization for a decade after my graduation. I know every aspect in operating and managing a merchandizing department since I have participated in every role of this sub-section. Furthermore, I have assisted the former merchandizing director for three years so I am experienced enough to lead a branch office individually.
The most significant disadvantage of my department is efficiency. Staffs are wasting their time on improper communication with clients and suppliers. As a result, resources are being used on administrative works rather than approaching more clients. I suggest dividing the office in two sub division – Administration sub division and Sales sub division. Colleagues in Administration sub division only need to focus on Administrative duties, and vice versa. I believe that the merchandizing department will become more competitive after my measure has been addressed.
Last but not least, thank you for offering me a chance to co-operate with you for ten years. I would be grateful if I have a chance to contribute the company in a new position.

Yours sincerely,
Chris Wong

The "was being awarded" here is a PAST CONTINUOUS TENSE, PASSIVE VOICE.
但係我唔覺得佢咁係啱喎, 反而我覺得係︰"We are delighted to know that the photo was awarded"...award邊有continuous的意思架?

You can check the tense with the following link:
https://www.ef.com/wwen/english-resources/english-grammar/passive-voice/

quote.msg: Shakespeare 啲句子究竟係咩文法嚟㗎⋯⋯寫詩係咪會掉轉晒啲位？文學點入門？想欣賞下英詩由邊度開始好

poetry唔一定淨係讀英國詩人，有好多選擇，易入手嘅我鍾意robert frost，edgar allen poe
John Keats用語復古深d，如果鍾意Shakespeare可以試吓
另外文學好廣泛，入手建議睇詩或者short stories，無咁辛苦，揀自己鍾意嘅題材
Shakespearean language 係難，如果覺得太深唔需要逼自己
Shakespearean難因為佢自己創造左好多用字，佢d作品尤其係sonnets有個特色/手法係iambi pentameter,係令句子讀出黎好有節奏感，高低起伏
所以讀Shakespeare其實係要講埋出黎先感覺更明顯（佢以前係寫drama所以節奏高低音好重要

replies.msg:
絲打thx!
有問題再請教下你

1）少啲笑人地啲英文
基本上我覺得non-native speaker even high level都冇資格judge人地嘅英文
你少啲笑人 人地就更有自信講 教學相長也
良性循環

2）我覺得亞洲人普遍少講，因為自己個語言好大唔同歐洲好多小國家要用mutual language去溝通

3）因應需求去學，假設你今日係做sales 咁基本上可以don’t give a shit to written english

4）識講重要過識寫好多，同埋現實日常生活溝通係冇人會在意你grammar(除非影響表達or mislead others)

5)colloquial english方面，english level就係以表達能力為單位，今日你表達到你想表達到嘅野就係好，至於level up就只不過係可以用更準嘅字/更短嘅句子去表達（通常為更少用嘅字）

例子有：redundant=unnecessary when it is more than it is needed
英文level冇咁好就可能只講到no need
好少少會講到unnecessary

6)經常immerse yourself into english, change the system language into english, spend more time on eng forums or news instad of Lihkg

7)加油 學語言向來都係以年計算嘅，但當你一年後睇番自己嘅notes, 驚歎自己點解會連一個咁易嘅字都唔識嘅時候，You NAILED it!!

China, widely known as denying the responsibility of spreading the Coronavirus, has been forcing its way to blame the U.S. Their headstrong official department has been evading the interrogations from the vast countries around the world and the press about the truth behind the country. China also sets it up as affording medical aid internationally, with the claim that it is out of sincerity towards the globe, but clearly this good faith is far from being accepted.

From early April, China has been ramping up international assistance to the globe. With the worst of the virus behind it, China offers ventilators and personal protective equipment which have later been proven invalid in most countries. Prior to Spanish complaint about the below-bar accuracy of Chinese testing kits, Europe has reported the products purchased from China to be unreliable with most of the patients. These facts have proven that China is acting out all these for another reason, probably shouting out for herself, than sole sincerity.

The scandals of China are not only limited to the national realm, but also extends to the international public health category. There are allegations against the collusion between China and World Health Organization (WHO). One conspicuous example is the sugarcoating comments from WHO on China’s actions. In turns, WHO is supporting China’s authoritarianism of concealing the truth of the virus, and backs that up by positively picturing the bright side of China’s actions. This kind of positive picturing is brainwashing the rest of the world who are not very clear about the misdeed of China amid the Coronavirus.

Insisting on the authoritarianism is nothing more than making things worse. China should cleanse its soul and own up to the truth, rather than making up the death tolls or hiding up true data of the virus. At the worst of the virus, anymore than what is going on around now, the best way is handing the national dignity aside, and go hand-in-hand within countries to cope with the pandemic. This may sound fanciful because one of our countries is holding loads of tech but inveigling its way to hide them. Our first step to the global triumph will be getting China open up.

Dear Boss,

I have read the internal circular that related to hire a new branch manager in my office. I would like to apply this vacancy as an internal candidate. The reason of why I am interested to the new post is that I am the right person to solve the main problems in the branch office. In addition, it is beneficial to my career development for working as a managerial role.
As a short review of my background, I have worked in this organization for a decade after my graduation. I know every aspect in operating and managing a merchandizing department since I have participated in every role of this sub-section. Furthermore, I have assisted the former merchandizing director for three years so I am experienced enough to lead a branch office individually.
The most significant disadvantage of my department is efficiency. Staffs are wasting their time on improper communication with clients and suppliers. As a result, resources are being used on administrative works rather than approaching more clients. I suggest dividing the office in two sub division – Administration sub division and Sales sub division. Colleagues in Administration sub division only need to focus on Administrative duties, and vice versa. I believe that the merchandizing department will become more competitive after my measure has been addressed.
Last but not least, thank you for offering me a chance to co-operate with you for ten years. I would be grateful if I have a chance to contribute the company in a new position.

Yours sincerely,
Chris Wong

China also sets it up as affording medical aid internationally, with the claim that it is out of sincerity towards the globe, but clearly this good faith is far from being accepted.

The scandals of China are not only limited to the national realm, but also extends to the international public health category. This kind of positive picturing is brainwashing the rest of the world who are not very clear about the misdeed of China amid the Coronavirus.

Insisting on the authoritarianism is nothing more than making things worse. At the worst of the virus, anymore than what is going on around now, the best way is handing the national dignity aside, and go hand-in-hand within countries to cope with the pandemic. China, widely known as denying the responsibility of spreading the Coronavirus, has been forcing its way to blame the U.S. Their headstrong official department has been evading the interrogations from the vast countries around the world and the press about the truth behind the country. China also sets it up as affording medical aid internationally, with the claim that it is out of sincerity towards the globe, but clearly this good faith is far from being accepted.

From early April, China has been ramping up international assistance to the globe. With the worst of the virus behind it, China offers ventilators and personal protective equipment which have later been proven invalid in most countries. Prior to Spanish complaint about the below-bar accuracy of Chinese testing kits, Europe has reported the products purchased from China to be unreliable with most of the patients. These facts have proven that China is acting out all these for another reason, probably shouting out for herself, than sole sincerity.

The scandals of China are not only limited to the national realm, but also extends to the international public health category. There are allegations against the collusion between China and World Health Organization (WHO). One conspicuous example is the sugarcoating comments from WHO on China’s actions. In turns, WHO is supporting China’s authoritarianism of concealing the truth of the virus, and backs that up by positively picturing the bright side of China’s actions. This kind of positive picturing is brainwashing the rest of the world who are not very clear about the misdeed of China amid the Coronavirus.

Insisting on the authoritarianism is nothing more than making things worse. China should cleanse its soul and own up to the truth, rather than making up the death tolls or hiding up true data of the virus. At the worst of the virus, anymore than what is going on around now, the best way is handing the national dignity aside, and go hand-in-hand within countries to cope with the pandemic. This may sound fanciful because one of our countries is holding loads of tech but inveigling its way to hide them. Our first step to the global triumph will be getting China open up.

replies.msg:
First, you have to check whether "difference" is countable or uncountable. In this case, "difference" can be both countable and uncountable.
So,
There is no difference between x and y.
There are no differences between x and y.
for the above, both sentences are ok.
There is a difference between x and y: x is yellow, but y is green.
There are some differences between x and y. First,... In addition,...

some nouns can only be uncountable, e.g. knowledge
so, you can say: I have no knowledge.
you can't say: I have no knowledges.

quote.msg:
no 後面究竟幾時跟plural

there is no

there are no

no differences were

no difference was

First, you have to check whether "difference" is countable or uncountable. In this case, "difference" can be both countable and uncountable.
So,
There is no difference between x and y.
There are no differences between x and y.
for the above, both sentences are ok.
There is a difference between x and y: x is yellow, but y is green.
There are some differences between x and y. First,... In addition,...

some nouns can only be uncountable, e.g. knowledge
so, you can say: I have no knowledge.
you can't say: I have no knowledges.

China, widely known as denying the responsibility of spreading the Coronavirus, has been forcing its way to blame the U.S. Their headstrong official department has been evading the interrogations from the vast countries around the world and the press about the truth behind the country. China also sets it up as affording medical aid internationally, with the claim that it is out of sincerity towards the globe, but clearly this good faith is far from being accepted.

From early April, China has been ramping up international assistance to the globe. With the worst of the virus behind it, China offers ventilators and personal protective equipment which have later been proven invalid in most countries. Prior to Spanish complaint about the below-bar accuracy of Chinese testing kits, Europe has reported the products purchased from China to be unreliable with most of the patients. These facts have proven that China is acting out all these for another reason, probably shouting out for herself, than sole sincerity.

The scandals of China are not only limited to the national realm, but also extends to the international public health category. There are allegations against the collusion between China and World Health Organization (WHO). One conspicuous example is the sugarcoating comments from WHO on China’s actions. In turns, WHO is supporting China’s authoritarianism of concealing the truth of the virus, and backs that up by positively picturing the bright side of China’s actions. This kind of positive picturing is brainwashing the rest of the world who are not very clear about the misdeed of China amid the Coronavirus.

Insisting on the authoritarianism is nothing more than making things worse. China should cleanse its soul and own up to the truth, rather than making up the death tolls or hiding up true data of the virus. At the worst of the virus, anymore than what is going on around now, the best way is handing the national dignity aside, and go hand-in-hand within countries to cope with the pandemic. This may sound fanciful because one of our countries is holding loads of tech but inveigling its way to hide them. Our first step to the global triumph will be getting China open up.

replies.msg:
The influence of the Chinese scandal extends far into the international public health category. Allegations against the collusion between China and the World Health Organization (WHO) have been circulating among many Asian countries. (呢到純粹係我覺得啲外國人好似完全唔知條譚啲衰野 仲好嬲侵pull budget) One conspicuous example is the commemorating comments on China’s actions by the WHO. Instead of calling out China for deliberately withholding information, WHO director general Tedros calls attention to China’s achievement during the pandemic in hopes of obscuring what China has really done. This collusion between international organization such as WHO and China has laid support to China’s authoritarian approach. It empowers Chinese authoritarianism and allows it to penetrate the global political scene. For people who are unaware of China’s irresponsible actions in the midst of coronavirus, the fact that this kind of corruption in international NGO is not widely covered in media also acts to obscure public opinions and could potentially result in serious political consequences.

Empowering authoritarianism in today’s world only leads to further destruction of human rights. Other players in international politics should no longer tolerate China’s lies. Instead, pressure and actions from around the Globe are needed to force China to pick up their responsibility as a member of the world. At the verge of the biggest public health crisis in modern time, a system of collaboration and peer-review between countries is particularly important in order for us to move forward as one society. Our first step to the global triumph against coronavirus will be achieving a more open and free China.

quote.msg:
no 後面究竟幾時跟plural

there is no

there are no

no differences were

no difference was

First, you have to check whether "difference" is countable or uncountable. In this case, "difference" can be both countable and uncountable.
So,
There is no difference between x and y.
There are no differences between x and y.
for the above, both sentences are ok.
There is a difference between x and y: x is yellow, but y is green.
There are some differences between x and y. First,... In addition,...

some nouns can only be uncountable, e.g. knowledge
so, you can say: I have no knowledge.
you can't say: I have no knowledges.

好怕多重否定既句子，好似呢句咁：

We cannot think it away without thinking away so much of our fundamental sense of our humanity that the attempt proves impossible

究然諗定唔諗？真係諗死人

replies.msg:
I think we both have the same understanding of the main point of the whole paragraph.

But I think ‘think away’ means ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking’ or ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking other things’
That’s why I take ‘think away’ as ‘not to think’ though there are subtle differences in the meaning.

So i would transform these words into:
Cannot think it away->have to think it
Without thinking away -> With the thought of

Here is my understanding of the sentence:
We have to think it (the conviction that we are free beings) with the thought of having much of our fundamental sense of humanity. This sense is so much that the attempt (Kant’s framework) is impossible.

That’s what i come up with this morning. I actually kept thinking about it for a night

Dear Boss,

I have read the internal circular that related to hire a new branch manager in my office. I would like to apply this vacancy as an internal candidate. The reason of why I am interested to the new post is that I am the right person to solve the main problems in the branch office. In addition, it is beneficial to my career development for working as a managerial role.
As a short review of my background, I have worked in this organization for a decade after my graduation. I know every aspect in operating and managing a merchandizing department since I have participated in every role of this sub-section. Furthermore, I have assisted the former merchandizing director for three years so I am experienced enough to lead a branch office individually.
The most significant disadvantage of my department is efficiency. Staffs are wasting their time on improper communication with clients and suppliers. As a result, resources are being used on administrative works rather than approaching more clients. I suggest dividing the office in two sub division – Administration sub division and Sales sub division. Colleagues in Administration sub division only need to focus on Administrative duties, and vice versa. I believe that the merchandizing department will become more competitive after my measure has been addressed.
Last but not least, thank you for offering me a chance to co-operate with you for ten years. I would be grateful if I have a chance to contribute the company in a new position.

Yours sincerely,
Chris Wong

quote.msg:
1）少啲笑人地啲英文
基本上我覺得non-native speaker even high level都冇資格judge人地嘅英文
你少啲笑人 人地就更有自信講 教學相長也
良性循環

2）我覺得亞洲人普遍少講，因為自己個語言好大唔同歐洲好多小國家要用mutual language去溝通

3）因應需求去學，假設你今日係做sales 咁基本上可以don’t give a shit to written english

4）識講重要過識寫好多，同埋現實日常生活溝通係冇人會在意你grammar(除非影響表達or mislead others)

5)colloquial english方面，english level就係以表達能力為單位，今日你表達到你想表達到嘅野就係好，至於level up就只不過係可以用更準嘅字/更短嘅句子去表達（通常為更少用嘅字）

例子有：redundant=unnecessary when it is more than it is needed
英文level冇咁好就可能只講到no need
好少少會講到unnecessary

6)經常immerse yourself into english, change the system language into english, spend more time on eng forums or news instad of Lihkg

7)加油 學語言向來都係以年計算嘅，但當你一年後睇番自己嘅notes, 驚歎自己點解會連一個咁易嘅字都唔識嘅時候，You NAILED it!!

China, widely known as denying the responsibility of spreading the Coronavirus, has been forcing its way to blame the U.S. Their headstrong official department has been evading the interrogations from the vast countries around the world and the press about the truth behind the country. China also sets it up as affording medical aid internationally, with the claim that it is out of sincerity towards the globe, but clearly this good faith is far from being accepted.

From early April, China has been ramping up international assistance to the globe. With the worst of the virus behind it, China offers ventilators and personal protective equipment which have later been proven invalid in most countries. Prior to Spanish complaint about the below-bar accuracy of Chinese testing kits, Europe has reported the products purchased from China to be unreliable with most of the patients. These facts have proven that China is acting out all these for another reason, probably shouting out for herself, than sole sincerity.

The scandals of China are not only limited to the national realm, but also extends to the international public health category. There are allegations against the collusion between China and World Health Organization (WHO). One conspicuous example is the sugarcoating comments from WHO on China’s actions. In turns, WHO is supporting China’s authoritarianism of concealing the truth of the virus, and backs that up by positively picturing the bright side of China’s actions. This kind of positive picturing is brainwashing the rest of the world who are not very clear about the misdeed of China amid the Coronavirus.

Insisting on the authoritarianism is nothing more than making things worse. China should cleanse its soul and own up to the truth, rather than making up the death tolls or hiding up true data of the virus. At the worst of the virus, anymore than what is going on around now, the best way is handing the national dignity aside, and go hand-in-hand within countries to cope with the pandemic. This may sound fanciful because one of our countries is holding loads of tech but inveigling its way to hide them. Our first step to the global triumph will be getting China open up.

quote.msg:
好怕多重否定既句子，好似呢句咁：

We cannot think it away without thinking away so much of our fundamental sense of our humanity that the attempt proves impossible

究然諗定唔諗？真係諗死人

I think we both have the same understanding of the main point of the whole paragraph.

But I think ‘think away’ means ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking’ or ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking other things’
That’s why I take ‘think away’ as ‘not to think’ though there are subtle differences in the meaning.

So i would transform these words into:
Cannot think it away->have to think it
Without thinking away -> With the thought of

Here is my understanding of the sentence:
We have to think it (the conviction that we are free beings) with the thought of having much of our fundamental sense of humanity. This sense is so much that the attempt (Kant’s framework) is impossible.

That’s what i come up with this morning. I actually kept thinking about it for a night

我見有人話咁樣係錯：Attached is a file for your checking.
但如果改成咁又啱唔啱呢：attached is a file for you to check. 但咁改好似怪怪地？

唔係錯check果part
for you to check / for your checking 都可以

錯係”Attached” is a file

Attached唔可以就咁用黎做名詞，一係就：
1. The file attached herein for your checking.
2. I attached a file for your checking.
3. Please find attached the file for your checking.

可以佢想講 Attached with this email a file for your checking.
只係老餅英文，無特別意思
除左法庭文件同政府，而家唔興咁寫
Attached is a file for you to check. 係倒裝句

唔該上面咁多位，
另外，英文咪有一種動詞可以唔加名詞係後面，
個d動詞係唔係不及物動詞？
例如：he is preparing. 得唔得？

replies.msg:
及物動詞--transitive verb
vt, (with object) 呢類字眼會係查呢個動詞時見到
e.g. Post (一定係post"一D野")

不及物動詞--intransitive verb
vi, (without object) 呢類字眼會係查呢個動詞時見到
e.g. arrive

有些動詞可以及物又得, 不及物又得

quote.msg:
I think we both have the same understanding of the main point of the whole paragraph.

But I think ‘think away’ means ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking’ or ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking other things’
That’s why I take ‘think away’ as ‘not to think’ though there are subtle differences in the meaning.

So i would transform these words into:
Cannot think it away->have to think it
Without thinking away -> With the thought of

Here is my understanding of the sentence:
We have to think it (the conviction that we are free beings) with the thought of having much of our fundamental sense of humanity. This sense is so much that the attempt (Kant’s framework) is impossible.

That’s what i come up with this morning. I actually kept thinking about it for a night

I think we both have the same understanding of the main point of the whole paragraph.

But I think ‘think away’ means ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking’ or ‘avoid some thoughts by thinking other things’
That’s why I take ‘think away’ as ‘not to think’ though there are subtle differences in the meaning.

So i would transform these words into:
Cannot think it away->have to think it
Without thinking away -> With the thought of

Here is my understanding of the sentence:
We have to think it (the conviction that we are free beings) with the thought of having much of our fundamental sense of humanity. This sense is so much that the attempt (Kant’s framework) is impossible.

首先你要查copy同document二字是否可以countable, 係呢度, 兩個字都可以
then, you have the following combinations:

a copy of the document - 一份影印一份文件 你只當係一份完整文件

a copy of the documents - 一份影印, 文件你當係分introduction, sales report, budget, 每份都視為獨立文件

copies of the document - 多份影印一整份文件

copies of the documents - 多份影印, 文件你當係分introduction, sales report, budget, 每份都視為獨立文件

決定在於你點區分那份文件

replies.msg:
First, skip "including myself and my own nature"
I cannot be considered free if nothing can conceivably be other than it is.
Then, try to rewrite it as:
If nothing can conceivably be other than it is, I cannot be considered free. (我個人認為)咁樣中字譯出來會通順一點
=> 如果沒有東西可以[被]視作為"它以外的東西", 我就不能[被視作]/[稱得上]為自由。
e.g. 如果沒有[水]可以被視作為"非水"/如果不能把水視之為炭, 那我就不能說我自由是自由的。
我估計其原因是, 我被外面的一些東西限制著, 例如, 知識告訴我水是透明的, 流動的, 但炭不是透明也不流動, 所以, 我根本沒有自由去說這是水。

我認為你呢句有問題: "I cannot be considered free if one thing cannot be considered as itself."
other than it is的意思是 "X" 相對的 "not X"

if nothing can conceivably be other than it is = if X cannot conceivably be Not-X.

China, widely known for denying their(her都ok,我慣用their with country) social responsibility during the Coronavirus crisis, is now pointing their finger at the U.S. Since the beginning of the pandemic, Chinese officials have been evading public interrogations and pulling wool over the eyes of millions. Furthermore, their tight control over the release of vital information signals the decline of freedom of press internationally. Right now, China is masking their irresponsible actions with their usual economic diplomacy strategies. However, the world comes to find out that even international medical aids can no longer justify China’s actions.

Since the beginning of April, China has been reinforcing international assistance to the world. With the worst of the virus behind it (呢到唔明你講咩）, China offers medical ventilators and personal protective equipments as international relief effort, which have shown low functionality in most countries. Prior to Spanish complaint on the below-average accuracy of Chinese testing kits, Europe has reported that products purchased from China are unreliable when applied to patients. The above facts have demonstrated that there might be another story behind China’s “good samaritan”act. ( 呢到你個conclusion其實直接對應唔到你上面嘅evidence 即係點解比啲cheap野你=got something to hide?)

The influence of the Chinese scandal extends far into the international public health category. Allegations against the collusion between China and the World Health Organization (WHO) have been circulating among many Asian countries. (呢到純粹係我覺得啲外國人好似完全唔知條譚啲衰野 仲好嬲侵pull budget) One conspicuous example is the commemorating comments on China’s actions by the WHO. Instead of calling out China for deliberately withholding information, WHO director general Tedros calls attention to China’s achievement during the pandemic in hopes of obscuring what China has really done. This collusion between international organization such as WHO and China has laid support to China’s authoritarian approach. It empowers Chinese authoritarianism and allows it to penetrate the global political scene. For people who are unaware of China’s irresponsible actions in the midst of coronavirus, the fact that this kind of corruption in international NGO is not widely covered in media also acts to obscure public opinions and could potentially result in serious political consequences.

Empowering authoritarianism in today’s world only leads to further destruction of human rights. Other players in international politics should no longer tolerate China’s lies. Instead, pressure and actions from around the Globe are needed to force China to pick up their responsibility as a member of the world. At the verge of the biggest public health crisis in modern time, a system of collaboration and peer-review between countries is particularly important in order for us to move forward as one society. 之前睇過一本講解isaiah berlin既中文哲學書，所以暫時都睇得明。英文就真係好大既障礙，就好似呢句：
I cannot be considered free if nothing, including myself and my own nature, can conceivably be other than it is.
前文係講有人將理性/知識同自由劃上等號
我諗左好耐先知道it係代表咩
而且我要將句子改寫 先諗得明個意思：
I cannot be considered free if one thing cannot be considered as itself.

所以自由就係自由，唔係理性，你唔可以因為我變得理性/得到知識，而聲稱我係自由

我用左三日去諗通呢句說話。點解英文咁難

First, skip "including myself and my own nature"
I cannot be considered free if nothing can conceivably be other than it is.
Then, try to rewrite it as:
If nothing can conceivably be other than it is, I cannot be considered free. (我個人認為)咁樣中字譯出來會通順一點
=> 如果沒有東西可以[被]視作為"它以外的東西", 我就不能[被視作]/[稱得上]為自由。
e.g. 如果沒有[水]可以被視作為"非水"/如果不能把水視之為炭, 那我就不能說我自由是自由的。
我估計其原因是, 我被外面的一些東西限制著, 例如, 知識告訴我水是透明的, 流動的, 但炭不是透明也不流動, 所以, 我根本沒有自由去說這是水。

我認為你呢句有問題: "I cannot be considered free if one thing cannot be considered as itself."
other than it is的意思是 "X" 相對的 "not X"

if nothing can conceivably be other than it is = if X cannot conceivably be Not-X.

replies.msg:
我覺得我所譯既意思都啱

你嗰句:
如果任何一件事物都不能夠被視為它以外既事物，那樣我就不能夠被視為自由
（X不等於X以外->所以我=不自由）

Rewrite：
所以同一件事物一定要被視作為佢自己本身，而因為咁樣，我先可以被視為自由。
(X=X ->我=自由）

再Rewrite（我嗰句）
所以如果同一件事物不再被視為佢自己本身，咁你就唔可以話我係自由
（X不等於X ->我=不自由）

你所譯嗰句對我黎講太深太難明，因為「否定」同「以外」呢啲概念同時存在。

仲有呢句唔係講人判斷事物既能力，而係批評有人將自由既概念轉換成理性同真理，跟仲住同你講只要你變得理性，你就會得到自由，只要你得到真理，自由就會掌握在你手中。佢想講自由就係自由，唔好將自由當成係其他, 當你將「真相」取代我既自由，呢刻我已經失去左自由。

原文：
The question of free will and determinism has preoccupied Berlin all his life. In this essay, he takes issue with the ancient doctrine that any increase in knowledge entails an increase in liberty. In its strongest form this view virtually identifies rationality and freedom. The doctrine of classical self-determinism, that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects. I cannot be considered free if nothing, including myself and my own nature, can conceivably be other than it is. In that case the notions of freedom and responsibility become otiose.

replies.msg:
原文：
The question of free will and determinism has preoccupied Berlin all his life. In this essay, he takes issue with the ancient doctrine that any increase in knowledge entails an increase in liberty. In its strongest form this view virtually identifies rationality and freedom. The doctrine of classical self-determinism, that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects. I cannot be considered free if nothing, including myself and my own nature, can conceivably be other than it is. In that case the notions of freedom and responsibility become otiose.

我大概同意你對這段中，有關理性與自由的理解。

我嗰句:
如果任何一件事物都不能夠被視為它以外既事物，那樣我就不能夠被視為自由。
（X不等於X以外->所以我=不自由）
不能rewrite作︰所以同一件事物一定要被視作為佢自己本身，而因為咁樣，我先可以被視為自由。(X=X ->我=自由）
只能rewrite為︰
(當我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由)


這與你嗰句係兩樣東西

D人話, 當你有rationality/knowledge, 你就有freedom, Berlin rejects. Self-determinism(我自己係點)不可以由知識去決定我係點, 如果知識決了我係點, 我不能是自由的。真正的自由，是當我能夠決定任何一樣野(X)為不是X (not-X), 或當我能夠決定我自己(self)或我的本質(my own nature)都不是我自己(not-self)。

我估計Berlin係強調individual’s choice, 他並不是 ”為爭辯而爭辯”, 而係individual’s choice如果被知識/我們一向奉之為對的東西 限制了, 我們以為我們已經有理性, 那麼我們就不會是真正自由的。
例如︰我是一個生於奴隸家族的人，知識/社會認為我inferior, 我連我自身的本質都不能說我不是一個奴隸, 我又怎能說我是自由的呢？認為生於奴隸家就一定是inferior? 這就是不能改變的知識嗎？

(巴/絲…我只能講到呢度, 我冇睇過Berlin, 頭先上網看了少少, 發覺他起碼已經有分positive freedom/negative freedom, 我唔想在不認識他的情況下繼續解讀他, 這對你/我/Berlin也不恰當)

quote.msg:
First, skip "including myself and my own nature"
I cannot be considered free if nothing can conceivably be other than it is.
Then, try to rewrite it as:
If nothing can conceivably be other than it is, I cannot be considered free. (我個人認為)咁樣中字譯出來會通順一點
=> 如果沒有東西可以[被]視作為"它以外的東西", 我就不能[被視作]/[稱得上]為自由。
e.g. 如果沒有[水]可以被視作為"非水"/如果不能把水視之為炭, 那我就不能說我自由是自由的。
我估計其原因是, 我被外面的一些東西限制著, 例如, 知識告訴我水是透明的, 流動的, 但炭不是透明也不流動, 所以, 我根本沒有自由去說這是水。

我認為你呢句有問題: "I cannot be considered free if one thing cannot be considered as itself."
other than it is的意思是 "X" 相對的 "not X"

if nothing can conceivably be other than it is = if X cannot conceivably be Not-X.

我覺得我所譯既意思都啱

你嗰句:
如果任何一件事物都不能夠被視為它以外既事物，那樣我就不能夠被視為自由
（X不等於X以外->所以我=不自由）

Rewrite：
所以同一件事物一定要被視作為佢自己本身，而因為咁樣，我先可以被視為自由。
(X=X ->我=自由）

再Rewrite（我嗰句）
所以如果同一件事物不再被視為佢自己本身，咁你就唔可以話我係自由
（X不等於X ->我=不自由）

你所譯嗰句對我黎講太深太難明，因為「否定」同「以外」呢啲概念同時存在。

仲有呢句唔係講人判斷事物既能力，而係批評有人將自由既概念轉換成理性同真理，跟仲住同你講只要你變得理性，你就會得到自由，只要你得到真理，自由就會掌握在你手中。佢想講自由就係自由，唔好將自由當成係其他, 當你將「真相」取代我既自由，呢刻我已經失去左自由。

原文：
The question of free will and determinism has preoccupied Berlin all his life. In this essay, he takes issue with the ancient doctrine that any increase in knowledge entails an increase in liberty. In its strongest form this view virtually identifies rationality and freedom. The doctrine of classical self-determinism, that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects. I cannot be considered free if nothing, including myself and my own nature, can conceivably be other than it is. In that case the notions of freedom and responsibility become otiose.

原文：
The question of free will and determinism has preoccupied Berlin all his life. In this essay, he takes issue with the ancient doctrine that any increase in knowledge entails an increase in liberty. In its strongest form this view virtually identifies rationality and freedom. The doctrine of classical self-determinism, that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects. I cannot be considered free if nothing, including myself and my own nature, can conceivably be other than it is. In that case the notions of freedom and responsibility become otiose.

我大概同意你對這段中，有關理性與自由的理解。

我嗰句:
如果任何一件事物都不能夠被視為它以外既事物，那樣我就不能夠被視為自由。
（X不等於X以外->所以我=不自由）
不能rewrite作︰所以同一件事物一定要被視作為佢自己本身，而因為咁樣，我先可以被視為自由。(X=X ->我=自由）
只能rewrite為︰
(當我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由)


這與你嗰句係兩樣東西

D人話, 當你有rationality/knowledge, 你就有freedom, Berlin rejects. Self-determinism(我自己係點)不可以由知識去決定我係點, 如果知識決了我係點, 我不能是自由的。真正的自由，是當我能夠決定任何一樣野(X)為不是X (not-X), 或當我能夠決定我自己(self)或我的本質(my own nature)都不是我自己(not-self)。

我估計Berlin係強調individual’s choice, 他並不是 ”為爭辯而爭辯”, 而係individual’s choice如果被知識/我們一向奉之為對的東西 限制了, 我們以為我們已經有理性, 那麼我們就不會是真正自由的。
例如︰我是一個生於奴隸家族的人，知識/社會認為我inferior, 我連我自身的本質都不能說我不是一個奴隸, 我又怎能說我是自由的呢？認為生於奴隸家就一定是inferior? 這就是不能改變的知識嗎？

(巴/絲…我只能講到呢度, 我冇睇過Berlin, 頭先上網看了少少, 發覺他起碼已經有分positive freedom/negative freedom, 我唔想在不認識他的情況下繼續解讀他, 這對你/我/Berlin也不恰當)

replies.msg:
成段係想指出berlin反對將理性睇成自由。以下呢句非常清晰講出段落大意：
The doctrine ... that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects.

所以，佢解釋如果自由(一樣東西)不能被睇成理性(該東西以外)，咁我都唔可以被視為自由

如果用你既解釋「我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由」，就會變左「當自由等於理性，我就可以被睇成自由。」
你呢個解釋解唔通，同前文互相予盾

其實好想知點解無la la講individual choice? 係咪因為第一句講free will同determinism?其實呢句只係文章嘅過渡句，不是重點，早知我唔打出黎

Individual choice 係我自己係網上找Berlin的理論時見到的。Berlin講的野與free will & determinism好有關, 所以與choice及段落尾講的freedom and responsibility好有關係。亦因為我唔熟, 所以唔想再interpret下去, 因為好可能會錯。

但是, 如果你說「我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由」，就會變左「當自由等於理性，我就可以被睇成自由。」----- 你不可以這樣推論, 因為你把 “理性=不自由”, 而兩者以外亦沒有其他東西。

唔知你知唔知genus & species的定義呢？如果你要說“理性=不自由”, “理性”及“自由”必須係同一個genus or species的東西。但好明顯它們不是。
簡單說，[一個圓形pizza, 當你切開了左右兩份, 左那份係叫”自由”, 右那份就是”不自由”, 而”不自由”亦=”理性”, 除了這兩份以外, 再容不下其他東西。] --- 但好明顯咁樣睇係錯的。

好難就咁樣講下去, 已經變了哲學討論了, but anyway, 我都開心可以同你交流, BTW, 你不如去找tutor/professor問下那句 “I cannot be considered free…”點解, 要話返我知, 我都好想知!

(巴/絲…我只能講到呢度, 我冇睇過Berlin, 頭先上網看了少少, 發覺他起碼已經有分positive freedom/negative freedom, 我唔想在不認識他的情況下繼續解讀他, 這對你/我/Berlin也不恰當)

成段係想指出berlin反對將理性睇成自由。以下呢句非常清晰講出段落大意：
The doctrine ... that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects.

所以，佢解釋如果自由(一樣東西)不能被睇成理性(該東西以外)，咁我都唔可以被視為自由

如果用你既解釋「我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由」，就會變左「當自由等於理性，我就可以被睇成自由。」
你呢個解釋解唔通，同前文互相予盾

其實好想知點解無la la講individual choice? 係咪因為第一句講free will同determinism?其實呢句只係文章嘅過渡句，不是重點，早知我唔打出黎

BTW,好感激巴打/絲同我討論，冇諗過有人咁認真同我討論，真係好感動

Individual choice 係我自己係網上找Berlin的理論時見到的。Berlin講的野與free will & determinism好有關, 所以與choice及段落尾講的freedom and responsibility好有關係。亦因為我唔熟, 所以唔想再interpret下去, 因為好可能會錯。

但是, 如果你說「我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由」，就會變左「當自由等於理性，我就可以被睇成自由。」----- 你不可以這樣推論, 因為你把 “理性=不自由”, 而兩者以外亦沒有其他東西。

唔知你知唔知genus & species的定義呢？如果你要說“理性=不自由”, “理性”及“自由”必須係同一個genus or species的東西。但好明顯它們不是。
簡單說，[一個圓形pizza, 當你切開了左右兩份, 左那份係叫”自由”, 右那份就是”不自由”, 而”不自由”亦=”理性”, 除了這兩份以外, 再容不下其他東西。] --- 但好明顯咁樣睇係錯的。

好難就咁樣講下去, 已經變了哲學討論了, but anyway, 我都開心可以同你交流, BTW, 你不如去找tutor/professor問下那句 “I cannot be considered free…”點解, 要話返我知, 我都好想知!

replies.msg:
自由以外包括好多野：理性，蘋果，貓狗。仲之唔叫自由嘅東西，就係叫做自由以外。理性只係其中一個自由以外既事物。

點解我用選擇用「理性」作為「自由之外」嘅其中一個例子，係因為呢兩樣係berlin所著重。佢強調唔可以將理性偷換變成自由，盧梭嘅強迫自由就係其中一個偷換概念嘅例子。

就算我唔用理性,改用自由以外, 你嘅句子都係唔通：
「我能稱自由為自由之外時, 我就是自由」
明顯同berlin既想法有衝突

未聽過genus and species，同埋我冇tutor/professor可以問, so sad

巴/絲:
我冇講過呢句︰
「我能稱自由為自由之外時, 我就是自由」
係呢度, 你把我個X換左做自由


我只是講了︰
如果任何一件事物都不能夠被視為它以外既事物，那樣我就不能夠被視為自由。（X不等於X以外->所以我=不自由）

不能rewrite作︰所以同一件事物一定要被視作為佢自己本身，而因為咁樣，我先可以被視為自由。(X=X ->我=自由）

只能rewrite為︰
(當我能稱X為not-X時, 我=自由)

replies.msg:
更正：佢著重—-唔可以將理性化睇成自由
呢句咪講左囉，已經解釋左啦
Doctrine... that true liberty is rational self-direction, Berlin rejects.

我認為以X=自由去理解「i cannot... other than it is」係最為正確:
當冇一件事物可以被睇成佢以外既事，
咁即係話，自由都唔可以被視為自由之外既事
又即係話，自由唔可以等同理性（呼應緊doctrine... Berlin rejects呢句）
所以如果有人講「true liberty其實就係將人變得理性化(rational self direction)」，而且仲話我只因為變得理性化而獲得自由，咁樣既自由根本唔係自由。
如果我有一日變得好理性，都唔可以視為得到自由
所以自由等於自由，自由不等於其他事物，所以自由當然都唔等於理性

我從來冇講過理性等於非自由喎，而係講自由唔可以被直接睇成理性。

「我是一個生於奴隸家族的人，知識/社會認為我inferior, 我連我自身的本質都不能說我不是一個奴隸, 我又怎能說我是自由的呢？認為生於奴隸家就一定是inferior? 這就是不能改變的知識嗎？」
其實唔係好明,即係話唔可以因為出生而決定一個人既自由同價值？即使係奴隸都可以係自由同有價值?
咁其實同呢篇文有咩關係？

我覺得你睇得太多網上資料，反而不自覺地無視原文訊息：doctrine... that true liberty... berlin rejects.
無視文章資料，僅靠網上資料去解讀文章中既句子, 又點能夠理解原文句子？

最後一句的確有提responsibility，但呢到佢只不過係想講「當自由唔再係自由，而係理性或者其他東西，伴隨自由而來既責任又會是什麼呢？」

replies.msg:
1) He is more handsome than me.
比較句型最主要係分清比較對象：handsome同me兩者比較就唔啱，因為係比較佢同你靚仔既程度。
應該係：
He is more handsome than I am.

2) Last year’s report is better than that of this year.
呢句用this year點解會唔啱，要用that of? 因為report同this year比較錯誤，所以要比較the report this year -> that of this year

“多年後，奧瑞里亞諾·布恩迪亞上校面對槍斃行刑隊，將會想起他父親帶他去找冰塊的那個遙遠的下午。當時馬康多是個小村子，只有二十棟 磚房，建在一條清水河岸上，河水順著史前巨蛋般又白又大又光滑的石頭河基往前流。世界太新，很多東西都還沒有名字，要稱述必須用手去指。 ……”
                      -遠景社《一百年的孤寂》（宋碧雲譯）

“許多年後，當邦迪亞上校面對行刑槍支隊時，他便會想起他父親帶他去找冰塊的那個遙遠的下午。那時馬康多是個二十戶人家的小村子，房屋 沿河岸邊建起，清楚的河水在光潔的石塊上流瀉，河床上那些白而大的石塊像史前時代的怪獸的巨蛋。這是一個嶄新的新天地，許多東西都還沒有命名，想要述說 還得用手去指。……”
                   -新潮文庫297《百年孤寂》（楊耐冬譯）

“許多年以後，奧雷良諾·布恩迪亞上校面對著行刑隊時，準會想起他爹帶他去看冰塊的那個多年前的下午來。那時馬孔多是個二十戶 一座座用土坯和蘄竹（這裡的“蘄”是輸入問題，原用的那個字一時沒找到）建成的房子修在河岸上，清澈的河水在遍布卵石的河床上流過，卵石 當時，這片世界還清新得好些東西都沒起上個名字，要提到時得使手指來指指點點。……”
                      -雲南人民《百年孤獨》（吳健恆譯）

Description

This course taught me how to generate a topic for investigation. I had learned it to select a topic that I am interested in, also how to generate a topic. First of all, I have learned and process to do the assignment, I need to do some research with academic resources must be current, authoritative, and relevant to collect accurate data. Such as go to the library to find out current year resources and data. Moreover, It is one way to organize and evaluate secondary research for an assignment. I have learned about how to write an annotation, for example, writing in-text citation use an APA format style to cite a source and how to write work by two authors or more than three authors. For writing a paragraph, I have learned how to summarize a paragraph and have a key supporting of details and paraphrase information to write a paragraph to ensure no plagiarism. Besides, I need to show how the data support actual data in my thesis and use the past tense to describe the past data, on the contrary, describe the future data I need to use future tense.

Interpretation

Furthermore, I have learned how to describe graphs, charts, and tables. In terms of the assignment last week, I did a table and line graphs. When I describe a table, I would like to summarise and an overview of the information by selecting and reporting significant elements or main features to make a comparison. Moreover, about describing line graphs, I need to convert information into points and represent the trends, these lines show about key factors that affected increase or decrease. Furthermore, describe a line graph verbs, adjectives, and adverbs are an important element to express the movement of the line and trends. For instance, verbs need to use rise, increase, up to, etc. That is important to describing graphs, charts, and tables. After describing graphs, charts, and tables, I need to show how the data support actual data in my thesis and select a significant data when I report the data of the trend that discuss future or guess about future, such as will increase, that are forecasted reporting the data. Also, if describing situations, it needs to give a reason ,effect and give about the example to prove the result.

replies.msg:
呢句係倒裝句(Inversion)，原句可以理解為：
“Society will be better if more jailbirds find jobs - whether they are those released early because of covid-19 or those still serving time.”

Inversion一般都係written English (尤其係formal)先會用，目的不外乎係強調某句子之類。至於呢一句，我諗意思上就唔使解釋太多，作用就係強調嘅地方就係「不論D囚犯點樣樣」，而個結構係將個verb放係subject前面，省去左whether。其他例子：
a. I will still go be you going or not (I will still go whether or not you are going.)
b. She will give up soon be she with or without assistance. (She will give up soon whether she is with or without assistance.)

有錯請指教！

Description

This course taught me how to generate a topic for investigation. I had learned it to select a topic that I am interested in, also how to generate a topic. First of all, I have learned and process to do the assignment, I need to do some research with academic resources must be current, authoritative, and relevant to collect accurate data. Such as go to the library to find out current year resources and data. Moreover, It is one way to organize and evaluate secondary research for an assignment. I have learned about how to write an annotation, for example, writing in-text citation use an APA format style to cite a source and how to write work by two authors or more than three authors. For writing a paragraph, I have learned how to summarize a paragraph and have a key supporting of details and paraphrase information to write a paragraph to ensure no plagiarism. Besides, I need to show how the data support actual data in my thesis and use the past tense to describe the past data, on the contrary, describe the future data I need to use future tense.

Interpretation

Furthermore, I have learned how to describe graphs, charts, and tables. In terms of the assignment last week, I did a table and line graphs. When I describe a table, I would like to summarise and an overview of the information by selecting and reporting significant elements or main features to make a comparison. Moreover, about describing line graphs, I need to convert information into points and represent the trends, these lines show about key factors that affected increase or decrease. Furthermore, describe a line graph verbs, adjectives, and adverbs are an important element to express the movement of the line and trends. For instance, verbs need to use rise, increase, up to, etc. That is important to describing graphs, charts, and tables. After describing graphs, charts, and tables, I need to show how the data support actual data in my thesis and select a significant data when I report the data of the trend that discuss future or guess about future, such as will increase, that are forecasted reporting the data. Also, if describing situations, it needs to give a reason ,effect and give about the example to prove the result.

“許多年後，當邦迪亞上校面對行刑槍支隊時，他便會想起他父親帶他去找冰塊的那個遙遠的下午。那時馬康多是個二十戶人家的小村子，房屋 沿河岸邊建起，清楚的河水在光潔的石塊上流瀉，河床上那些白而大的石塊像史前時代的怪獸的巨蛋。這是一個嶄新的新天地，許多東西都還沒有命名，想要述說 還得用手去指。……”
                   -新潮文庫297《百年孤寂》（楊耐冬譯）

“許多年以後，奧雷良諾·布恩迪亞上校面對著行刑隊時，準會想起他爹帶他去看冰塊的那個多年前的下午來。那時馬孔多是個二十戶 一座座用土坯和蘄竹（這裡的“蘄”是輸入問題，原用的那個字一時沒找到）建成的房子修在河岸上，清澈的河水在遍布卵石的河床上流過，卵石 當時，這片世界還清新得好些東西都沒起上個名字，要提到時得使手指來指指點點。……”
                      -雲南人民《百年孤獨》（吳健恆譯）

其實鬼佬寫文用字唔使好深
反而學多啲字型既變化，再重新組句：
e.g. cannot be replaced, irreplaceable, unlikely to be replaced in the future decades

另外同中文一樣用多啲synonyms
盡量上一句出現左既字，下一句用synonym代替
e.g. They had this groundbreaking idea of...... This innovative concept helps........

“Society will be better if more jailbirds find jobs - be they those released early because of vivid-19 or those still serving time.”

replies.msg:
be they / it XXX or YYY係常用句式
通常係elaborate前面果句，中文意思大概係：
一樣野點點點 - 不論果樣係xxx定係yyy
e.g. I love potato-based food, be it french fries or mashed potatoes.

你果個例句意思係（英文句式直譯）：
如果多啲罪犯搵到野做，個社會就會更好 - - 不論啲罪犯係因為肺炎提早釋放又好、定還是仲係坐緊監都好。

1 Paragraph to explain why self discipline is important
3 Ways (3 paragraphs) to suggest how to develop self discipline

Self discipline is undoubtedly being a principal driver to our lives, fostering us to be astute, competitive and discerning in the surrounding environments. People with excellent self-discipline are always sharing rigorous standards, oversight and guardrails, for instance, incurring to accomplish your goals more easily. Self-discipline is not an empty phrase; indeed, it is factoring how you detail your schedules and daily lives, including to maintain a healthy diet, finish your jobs on time and read 30 minutes everyday etc. This obviously drives people to feel more empowered and confident in their workplace life.

Setting up goals is benign to develop self discipline. You are always changing the ways of living when you try to achieve the targets. For example, you detaily read the English news and books when you invoke to improve your English skills. It is not mandatory but becomes a motivation to reach the missions. Reading would unsuspiciously become a part of your lives, which is reminiscent of having an excellent hobby to improve yourselves, and that is the very purpose of developing self discipline.

Making friends with excellent self control is another way to develop your self discipline. The story of one who lies with dogs riding with fleas, reiterating that one takes on the attribute of his/her associate. Following the heels of good role models poses you to have good daily routines. At the same time, these friends are able to deeply give you advice, tapering your procrastination and reinforcing your persistence, which is the major conundrum you resisted when maintaining self discipline.

Eventually, always reminding the benefits of maintaining self control is helping us to develop self discipline. Self discipline does not solely affect yourself, but the implications to others could be unprecedented. Armed with fact, as above mentioned, one takes on the colour of one’s take on the attribute of others. You can become role models, sharing your experience and thoughts to others. Once you think in this way, it is not difficult to develop self discipline in a full-stream-ahead approach.

但係因為原文本身都有啲前後句唔通順

所以篇英文可能都有呢個問題

同埋呢篇係我第一篇persuasive writing

想睇下寫法應該朝咩方向

Over the past two months, Hong Kong citizens have continuously addressed their demands with different approaches, including multiple times of peaceful rally and assembly. However, The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) has never looked the demands in the face. It acquiesced in the police force’s deteriorated abuse of its authority and the resulting violence. The Hong Kong Police Force has long been out of control, and its villainies are already threatening the citizens’ personal safety. Meanwhile, the conflicts and contradictions within the society are worsening. Everyone is on edge at the moment.

What most terrifying in Hong Kong is not the divergence in political stance, but the substantive extinguishment of its legal system. During these difficult days, we, as students who received higher education, have profoundly recognized the value of freedom, conscience and democracy. Pursuing knowledge and truth, university students should also have the responsibility to distinguish between rightfulness and falsehood, and to defend human rights and the rule of law against any terms of White Terror. Being born in uncertain times carries certain responsibilities. We hope that our fellows can rise or fall together as one and accuse all of the injustice and unfairness by substantive acts.

We now appeal to every CityU student to engage in the school strike beginning from 2 September 2019, and participates the rally held in the Yeung Kin Man Academic Building (AC1).

What makes Hong Kong a precious place, at least for now, is its people’s possession of freedom of speech and choice. A single spark can light a prairie fire. We hope every CityU student can respond to the school strike and roar out before any suppression.

Five demands, no one less.
Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times.

P.S. The details will be further announced.

be they / it XXX or YYY係常用句式
通常係elaborate前面果句，中文意思大概係：
一樣野點點點 - 不論果樣係xxx定係yyy
e.g. I love potato-based food, be it french fries or mashed potatoes.

你果個例句意思係（英文句式直譯）：
如果多啲罪犯搵到野做，個社會就會更好 - - 不論啲罪犯係因為肺炎提早釋放又好、定還是仲係坐緊監都好。

呢句幾好用
Be it XXX or XXX

好似whether it is XXX or XXX
但其實係咪有o的舊／好正式？

日常都有人講

Dear Boss,

I have read the internal circular that related to hire a new branch manager in my office. I would like to apply this vacancy as an internal candidate. The reason of why I am interested to the new post is that I am the right person to solve the main problems in the branch office. In addition, it is beneficial to my career development for working as a managerial role.
As a short review of my background, I have worked in this organization for a decade after my graduation. I know every aspect in operating and managing a merchandizing department since I have participated in every role of this sub-section. Furthermore, I have assisted the former merchandizing director for three years so I am experienced enough to lead a branch office individually.
The most significant disadvantage of my department is efficiency. Staffs are wasting their time on improper communication with clients and suppliers. As a result, resources are being used on administrative works rather than approaching more clients. I suggest dividing the office in two sub division – Administration sub division and Sales sub division. Colleagues in Administration sub division only need to focus on Administrative duties, and vice versa. I believe that the merchandizing department will become more competitive after my measure has been addressed.
Last but not least, thank you for offering me a chance to co-operate with you for ten years. I would be grateful if I have a chance to contribute the company in a new position.

Yours sincerely,
Chris Wong
